title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1926.1 - In general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1926.1 - In general

State Regulations

Before an inmate may participate in a day reporting
program, he must sign both a memorandum of agreement (MOA) and a copy of the
day reporting rules contained in section
1926.3
of
this Part, including any special conditions as may be necessary in a given
circumstance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1926.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
